message.body: Hey, how is your week going?
really good, but it's going quickly! how's yours?
The same. Do you have a lot of studying to do? Are you free on sunday night?
no, sunday night is good! i don't really have any more tests until next friday, just like assignment stuff, so i'm alright.
Sounds good. I look forward to seeing you.
hey, i'm so so sorry but i just remembered that i'm busy 5-8:30 on sunday. so before/after that, or maybe monday instead?
thank you for understanding. :) and happy friday!
